title.en: The Verses of the Eight Noble Auspicious Ones

text.en: Oṃ! Homage to the Buddha, Dharma and Noble Saṅgha—
text.en-trans: om, nangsi namdak rangzhin lhündrubpé

text.en: All that dwell in the auspicious realms of the ten directions,
text.en-trans: tashi chok chü zhing na zhukpa yi

text.en: Where appearance and existence is completely pure, its nature spontaneously perfect,
text.en-trans: sangye chö dang gendün pakpé tsok

text.en: May everything be auspicious for us all!
text.en-trans: kün la chaktsal dakchak tashi shok

text.en: King of Lamps, Steadfast and Powerful One Whose Vision Fulfils All Aims,
text.en-trans: drönmé gyalpo tsalten döndrup gong

text.en: Glorious Ornament of Love, Sacred Splendour Renowned for Virtue,
text.en-trans: jampé gyen pal gedrak paldampa

text.en: The One Whose Concern for All Brings Him Universal Renown,
text.en-trans: künla gongpa gyacher drakpa chen

text.en: Glorious One as Renowned as Mount Meru in Eminence and Might,
text.en-trans: lhünpo tar paktsal drakpal dang ni

text.en: Glorious One Renowned as Caring for All Sentient Beings,
text.en-trans: semchen tamchela gong drakpé pal

text.en: Glorious One Renowned as Most Powerful in Satisfying Wishes—
text.en-trans: yitsim dzepa tsal rab drakpal té

text.en: Homage to you, the Eight Sugatas,
text.en-trans: tsen tsam töpé tashi pal pelwa

text.en: Merely hearing your names increases auspiciousness and success!
text.en-trans: dewar shekpa gyé la chaktsal lo

text.en: Youthful Mañjuśrī, glorious Vajrapāṇi,
text.en-trans: jampal zhönnu palden dorjé dzin

text.en: Lord Avalokiteśvara, protector Maitreya,
text.en-trans: chenrezik wang gönpo jampé pal

text.en: Kṣitigarbha, Sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin,
text.en-trans: sa yi nyingpo dribpa nampar sel

text.en: Ākāśagarbha, and Samantabhadra noblest of all—
text.en-trans: namkhé nyingpo pakchok kuntuzang

text.en: Utpala ﬂower, vajra, white lotus, nāga-tree,
text.en-trans: utpal dorjé pekar lushing dang

text.en: Jewel, moon, sword and sun—
text.en-trans: norbu dawa raldri nyima yi

text.en: Gracefully holding your emblems, and supreme in granting auspiciousness and success,
text.en-trans: chaktsen lek nam tashi pal gyi chok

text.en: Homage to you, the Eight Bodhisattvas!
text.en-trans: changchub sempa gyé la chaktsal lo

text.en: The most precious umbrella, the auspicious golden fishes,
text.en-trans: rinchen duk chok tashi ser gyi nya

text.en: The wish-fulﬁlling vase of goodness, the exquisite kamala flower,
text.en-trans: dö jung bum zang yi ong kamala

text.en: The conch of fame and glory, the glorious knot of prosperity,
text.en-trans: nyendrak dung dang püntsok pal be'u

text.en: The eternal banner of victory and the all-powerful wheel:
text.en-trans: minub gyaltsen wanggyur khorlo té

text.en: Holding these eight most precious emblems
text.en-trans: rinchen tak chok gyé kyi chaktsen chen

text.en: Are the creators of delight, making offerings to the buddhas of all directions and times.
text.en-trans: chok dü gyalwa chö ching gyé kyema

text.en: Homage to you, the Eight Auspicious Goddesses—Beauty, Garlands, Song, Dance, Flowers, Incense, Light and Perfume—
text.en-trans: gek sok ngowo drenpé pal pelwé

text.en: Merely thinking of you makes success grow more and more!
text.en-trans: tashi lhamo gyé la chaktsal lo

text.en: Mighty Brahmā, Śiva1and Viṣṇu,
text.en-trans: tsangpa chenpo dejung semebu

text.en: Indra the thousand-eyed, the kings Dhṛtarāṣṭra,
text.en-trans: mik tong den dang gyalpo yulkhor sung

text.en: Virūdhaka, Virūpakṣa the lord of nāgas,
text.en-trans: pak kyepo dang luwang mikmizang

text.en: And Vaiśravaṇa—each one holding your divine emblem:
text.en-trans: namtösé té lhadzé khorlo dang

text.en: Wheel, trident, lance, vajra,
text.en-trans: trishula dang dungtung dorjé chen

text.en: Vīṇā, sword, stūpa and banner of victory—
text.en-trans: piwam raldri chöten gyaltsen dzin

text.en: Homage to you, the Eight Guardians of the World,
text.en-trans: sa sum né su gelek tashi pel

text.en: Who make auspiciousness and positivity grow in the three realms!
text.en-trans: jikten kyongwa gyé la chaktsal lo

text.en: With all obstacles and harmful influences paciﬁed,
text.en-trans: dakchak deng dir jawa tsompa la

text.en: May the work we are now about to begin
text.en-trans: gek dang nyewar tsewa kün zhi né

text.en: Meet with ever-growing fulﬁlment and success, and
text.en-trans: dödön pal pel samdön yizhin drub

text.en: Bring good fortune, prosperity, happiness and peace!
text.en-trans: tashi delek pünsum tsokpar shok
